cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.13.0)

project(thirdparty)

include(ExternalProject)

set(THIRDPARTY thirdparty)

set(EXTERNAL_INSTALL_LOCATION ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/)

message("-- TOOLCHAIN:" $ENV{TOOLCHAIN})

ExternalProject_Add(lib60870
    URL ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/lib60870
    CMAKE_ARGS -DCMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX=${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR} -DCMAKE_C_COMPILER=${CMAKE_C_COMPILER} 
     -DCMAKE_CXX_COMPILER=${CMAKE_CXX_COMPILER} -DCMAKE_C_FLAGS=${CMAKE_C_FLAGS} 
)

ExternalProject_Add(libiec61850
    URL ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/lib61850
    CMAKE_ARGS -DCMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX=${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR} -DCMAKE_C_COMPILER=${CMAKE_C_COMPILER}
     -DCMAKE_CXX_COMPILER=${CMAKE_CXX_COMPILER} -DCMAKE_C_FLAGS=${CMAKE_C_FLAGS}
)
